name: Guardians of The Bygone
description:
* The player (FINDS) and collects the (LOST) treasure by killing the mummies 
* If the mummy touches the player he loses a life
* The player should collect the toilet paper before the mummies step on it because it gives the mummies power ups (the white toilet paper increases the mummies' speed and the golden toilet paper increases the size of the mummy and it would need to be shot more times to die according to how many golden toilet papers it stepped on)
